data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
D'oh -- just found the form. Currying is a useful idiom to add to
    Perl, and one not currently supported by any modules (that I can
    find). I believe people who are comfortable with functional
    languages can benefit from using this, and those who are not can
    learn by playing with it.

    /s
